name: deddy.additional-right-click-menu
title: Brackets Additional Right Click Menu
description: A Brackets extension that add additional functionality to Brackets editor right menu, like cut, copy, paste, select all, Camel Case, UPPERCASE, lowercase and some functionality from edit menu. Works on windows 7 too!!! And added a shortcuts to some menu items. changelog: bug fix for paste in Brackets 1.3
author: Deddy Lasmono Putro <caphodel@gmail.com>
